text: And don’t forget about the ambient channel - sounds of Topolò, all day long.
At 11 — Branching in, branching out LIVE with Charlotte Perka and Jo Knilli from Zest Kollektiv on pedagogies, summer schools and their time in Tplv in spring 2025
At 15:00, Petra Filagrana and Demelza Kooij on filming wolves, language, and borders.
At 19.00 or a bit later a conversation between Vida, Elena, Aljaz, Dora and Maria
